Welcome to Probabilistic Robot Localization package documentation¶

Probabilistic Robot Localization is Python Library containing the main algorithms explained in the Probabilisitic Robot Localization Book used in the Probabilisitic Robotics and the Hands-on Localization Courses of the Intelligent Field Robotic Systems (IFRoS) European Erasmus Mundus Master.

Note

This documentation is still under construction.

API¶

  • Pose Representation
    • Pose
    • Pose 3DOF
    • Pose 4DOF
  • Feature Representation
    • Feature
    • Cartesian Feature
    • Polar Feature
  • Coordinate Conversion Functions
    • Polar To Cartesian
    • Cartesian To Polar
    • Spherical To Cartesian
    • Cartesian To Spherical
    • Identity Conversion
  • Robot Simulation
    • SimulatedRobot
    • 3 DOF Diferential Drive Robot Simulation
    • 4 DOF AUV Robot Simulation
  • Filters
    • Histogram Filter
    • Particle Filter
    • Gaussian Filter
  • Localization
    • Robot Localization
    • Dead Reckoning
    • Grid Localization
    • Montecarlo Localization
    • Gaussian Filter Localization
    • Feature Map based EKF Localization
  • Simulatenous Localization And Mapping
    • Feature based EKF Simultaneous Localization And Mapping
